original_text:
Every valley shall be lifted up,
    and every mountain and hill be made low;
the uneven ground shall become level,
    and the rough places a plain.
korean_text: 골짜기마다 돋우어지며 산마다, 언덕마다 낮아지며 고르지 아니한 곳이 평탄하게 되며 험한 곳이 평지가 될 것이요

sentences.original_text: Every valley shall be lifted up
and every mountain and hill be made low
the uneven ground shall become level
and the rough places a plain
